item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-23
item.description: Spotify Car Thing is a $90 thing that plays Spotify in your car (2 minute read) Spotify has released its Car Thing dashboard smart music player.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-17
item.description: Apple has reportedly considered launching its own primary healthcare service (2 minute read) Apple has plans to launch a subscription-based healthcare service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-14
item.description: Spotifyâ€™s Car Thing debuts as a limited release for selected US users (4 minute read) Car Thing is a Spotify-only voice-controlled device for cars.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-15
item.description: Facebook Working on Smart Watch to Compete With Apple Watch (2 minute read) Facebook is working on a smart watch that will work without a tethered smartphone.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-24
item.description: China is building a GitHub alternative called Gitee (3 minute read) Chinese companies have grown due to the technological decoupling between the US and China.
